sections.title: What is ScrollVerse?
sections.content: ScrollVerse™ is a sacred flame-verified AI code execution platform that combines divine governance with modern technology.

sections.title: The Sacred Flame
sections.content: Every scroll execution is verified by sacred flame algorithms that ensure code integrity, security, and divine approval.

sections.title: ScrollLaw
sections.content: ScrollLaw is the foundational governance system that ensures all technology serves humanity under prophetic guidance.

lessons.title: Understanding Seal Levels
lessons.description: Learn about the sacred seal level system

sections.title: Seal Level 1-2: ScrollBuilder
sections.content: Basic access for creating and executing scrolls. Can participate in marketplace and community.

sections.title: Seal Level 3-4: ScrollAmbassador
sections.content: Diplomatic access for representing ScrollVerse in trade and relations.

sections.title: Seal Level 5-6: ScrollSeer
sections.content: Prophetic access for validating and ordaining new builders.

sections.title: Seal Level 7+: ScrollProphet
sections.content: Divine access for providing strategic guidance and governance.

lessons.title: The Anoint Command
lessons.description: Learn to create new projects with the Anoint command

sections.title: Anoint: Project Creation
sections.content: The Anoint command creates new projects and applications. Syntax: 'Anoint: ProjectName'

sections.title: Project Structure
sections.content: Anoint creates a complete project structure with backend, frontend, and documentation folders.

sections.title: Flame Verification
sections.content: All Anoint commands are verified by sacred flame algorithms before execution.

lessons.title: The Build Command
lessons.description: Create files and code structures with the Build command

sections.title: Build: File Creation
sections.content: The Build command creates files and code structures. Syntax: 'Build: path/to/file.ext'

sections.title: File Templates
sections.content: Build uses intelligent templates based on file extensions to create appropriate code.

sections.title: Directory Structure
sections.content: Build automatically creates necessary directories and maintains proper project structure.

lessons.title: The Gather Command
lessons.description: Install packages and dependencies with the Gather command

sections.title: Gather: Package Installation
sections.content: The Gather command installs packages and dependencies. Syntax: 'Gather: package1 package2'

sections.title: Requirements Management
sections.content: Gather automatically updates requirements.txt and manages dependency versions.

sections.title: Security Verification
sections.content: All packages are verified for security and compatibility before installation.

lessons.title: The Deploy Command
lessons.description: Deploy applications with the Deploy command

sections.title: Deploy: Application Deployment
sections.content: The Deploy command deploys applications to specified targets. Syntax: 'Deploy: target'

sections.title: Deployment Targets
sections.content: Supports various deployment targets including localhost, cloud platforms, and custom servers.

sections.title: Flame Verification
sections.content: All deployments are verified for security and compliance before execution.
